item.description:
Let's get together at the Ct Post Mall Food Court.

 

http://westfield.com/connecticutpost/

westfield.com/connecticutpost/

 

Meet over near Johnny Rockets

 

http://westfield.com/connecticutpost/ourstores/details/johnny-rockets-27414.html

westfield.com/connecticutpost/ourstores/details/johnny-rockets-27414.html

 

I know that this is too far for those off I - 91.

You do not have to RSVP No and say that it is too far.

 

Happy Memorial Day Weekend.

We were here this time last year so let's try it again.

This seating area is the Meet Up location, I will probably go get Chinese

Food that is over by the Elevator and bring it back to the

Meeting location
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the Chairs around Johnny Rockets below the Esculator.
item.name: Coffee Talk: Meet at CT Post Mall Food Court
